name: SummitA
description: SummitA uses AI-driven insights to help teams build stronger connections and achieve peak alignment. The platform empowers leaders to identify strengths, address gaps, and create strategies for fostering collaboration and cohesion across their organizations.

name: Clarae
description: Clarae decodes health data with precision, offering personalized nutrition insights powered by AI. The platform enables users to make informed dietary decisions, transforming complex data into actionable steps for achieving optimal health and wellness.

name: FoI Podcast
description: Faces of Inclusion is a podcast that uncovers powerful stories of resilience, growth, and creativity. Through engaging conversations and inspiring voices, it offers listeners a journey into the lives of those who have overcome challenges and sparked meaningful change.

name: Media Pulse
description: Media Pulse turns data into decisions by delivering real-time news, trends, and analytics. Designed for precision and speed, the platform empowers users to navigate todayâ€™s fast-paced world with insights that matter.
